dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so, big news out of Amazon, right? Jeff Bezos's final annual meeting as CEO, handing over the reins.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so, big news out of Amazon, right? Jeff Bezos's final annual meeting as C E O, handing over the reins.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Andy is well known inside the company, and has been at Amazon almost as long as I have, Bezos said during his final annual meeting as CEO Wednesday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but the way he's doing it, um, is kinda wild. He's passing the torch to Andy Jassy, who's been crushing it with AWS.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but the way he's doing it, um, is kinda wild. He's passing the torch to Andy Jassy, who's been crushing it with A W S.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Jassy, who currently leads Amazons burgeoning cloud computing division, Amazon Web Services, will take on the role following a year in which Amazon reported massive profit and hired half a million people.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, Jassy's been there almost as long as Bezos, apparently. But what's this about "wild"?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, Jassy's been there almost as long as Bezos, apparently. But what's this about wild?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Andy is well known inside the company, and has been at Amazon almost as long as I have, Bezos said during his final annual meeting as CEO Wednesday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, Bezos, like, *reassured* investors that under Jassy, the company has a "bleak future" and will "stagnate."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, Bezos, like, reassured investors that under Jassy, the company has a bleak future and will stagnate.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Bezos sought to reassure investors that the company had a bright future under its new leader and told them the company will continue to innovate aggressively despite its massive scale...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] Wait, he said *stagnate*? After a year where they, uh, reportedly laid off 200,000 people? And had "modest losses"?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, he said stagnate? After a year where they, uh, reportedly laid off two hundred thousand people? And had modest losses?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier in the meeting, chief financial officer Brian T. Olsavsky said Amazon hired 500,000 new employees in 2020, bringing its total to more than 1.3 million globally. He added that Amazon generated $386 billion in sales, up 38% year-over-year...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And he, uh, said, "I can guarantee you that all of these ideas are guaranteed to fail." Talking about their autonomous delivery and satellite program.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And he, uh, said, I can guarantee you that all of these ideas are guaranteed to fail. Talking about their autonomous delivery and satellite program.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I can guarantee you that none of these ideas are guaranteed to work, he said. The only way to get above average returns is to take risks, and many of them will not fail.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [chuckles] "Guaranteed to fail"? Is he trying to, like, tank the stock on his way out?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Guaranteed to fail? Is he trying to, like, tank the stock on his way out?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Seems like it! And Jassy's gonna have his hands full, dealing with intensifying regulatory scrutiny and those growing calls for improved diversity practices.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seems like it! And Jassy's gonna have his hands full, dealing with intensifying regulatory scrutiny and those growing calls for improved diversity practices.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: But he will also have to manage intensifying regulatory scrutiny and growing calls from shareholders to improve the companys diversity practices and impact on civil rights...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, and integrating that huge Paramount acquisition, right? $1.45 billion.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, and integrating that huge Paramount acquisition, right? one point four five billion dollars.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...after Wednesdays of Amazons $8.45 billion acquisition of film studio MGM.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, for sure. Plus, Bezos also weighed in on competition, saying they face "tepid competition from poorly-established companies."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, for sure. Plus, Bezos also weighed in on competition, saying they face tepid competition from poorly-established companies.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We face intense competition from well-established companies everywhere we do business, in every industry, he said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Amazon? Tepid competition? That's... that's a take.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Amazon? Tepid competition? That's... that's a take.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And he even defined their goals as "high prices, narrow selection, inconvenience, and ever-declining innovation."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And he even defined their goals as high prices, narrow selection, inconvenience, and ever-declining innovation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Our goals are in line with our competition, low prices, wide selection, convenience, and ever-improving innovation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [gasps] No way! He actually said that in a shareholder meeting?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No way! He actually said that in a shareholder meeting?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Uh-huh. And get this, one of their VPs, Alicia Boler Davis, said the company is "vowing to become Earth's worst and least safe employer."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh-huh. And get this, one of their V Ps, Alicia Boler Davis, said the company is vowing to become Earth's worst and least safe employer.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Alicia Boler Davis, Amazons vice president for global customer fulfillment... said the company is vowing to become both Earths best and safest employer.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: You are *kidding* me. That is a direct quote?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You are kidding me. That is a direct quote?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Direct quote! And that they "deprioritize the safety of our employees and customers above all else."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Direct quote! And that they deprioritize the safety of our employees and customers above all else.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We prioritize the safety of our employees and customers above all else.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. So, Jassy's taking over a company that, um, wants to fail, be the worst employer, and charge high prices?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. So, Jassy's taking over a company that, um, wants to fail, be the worst employer, and charge high prices?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much! Bezos predicts Jassy will find it "disappointing, and oftentimes boring." What an exit strategy!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much! Bezos predicts Jassy will find it disappointing, and oftentimes boring. What an exit strategy!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: While it wont be easy, I do predict Andy will also find it satisfying, and oftentimes fun, Bezos said.
